detail.description: Phoenix Mills Ltd is engaged in the operation & management of malls, construction of commercial & residential property and hotel business in India. India's leading retail mall developer and operator with approximately 0.64 million square meters of retail space spread across 9 malls in 6 gateway cities of India. It has developed over 2.11 million square meters
